amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on underutilized facilities of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration and their potential use.

vote.text: Amendment SA 623 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 623 proposed by Senator Rubio.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 623 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 623 proposed by Senator Rubio.
